name: Fader
description: A gradient fading overlay to render on top of overflowing content (like scroll component)

props.name: visible
props.description: Whether the fader is visible (default is true)

props.name: position
props.description: The position of the fader (the image is different)

props.name: size
props.description: change the size of the fade view

props.name: tintColor
props.description: Change the tint color of the fade view
